formatDescription: Programme files for R, a programming language for statistical computing. The official R software is free, open source, and run on command line. Other companies have produced GUI software packages which are commercially available. R files contain code which can be executed within the R environment, including commands for creating objects such as functions and values.
provenanceCompoundName: Yale University Library / Yale University Library

supportedBy.supportedBy: R Core Team / The R Project for Statistical Computing
supportedBy.source: Yale University Library / Yale University Library
